website = | footnotes = }} is a town in Fukushima, Japan. It is in the Futaba District and is close to Fukushima Daiichi Nuclear Power Plant. The Japan national football team training center, J. Village, is in Hirono. Category:Towns in Fukushima Prefecture
title: Hirono, Fukushima
